teacheasy.data.lessondata

Class LessonDefaultSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.lessondata.LessonDefaultSettings

  • public class LessonDefaultSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the data that describes the default settings for a lesson as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format.
    Version:
    1.0 08 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.

        Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        nFontSize - The default font size.
        nFont - The default font size.
        nBackgroundColour - The default background colour.
        nFontColour - The default font colour.
        nLineColour - The default line colour.
        nFillColour - The defualt fill colour.
